arts.ttl: Italy vs Estonia – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Italy resume their 2026 World Cup qualifying campaign with a crucial Group I clash against Estonia at Atalanta’s home ground this week. The Azzurri, under new head coach Gennaro Gattuso, host the Baltic side as they aim to claw back ground on group leaders Norway. arts.ttl: Italy vs Estonia – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Italy and Estonia meet in a crucial 2026 FIFA World Cup European Qualifier on Friday at Atalanta’s home ground. The Azzurri, who currently sit third in Group I with three points from their opening two matches, have remarkably not qualified for the competition since 2014. arts.ttl: Report – Gattuso To Start Inter Milan Trio For Italy In FIFA World Cup Qualifier Vs Estonia
arts.sum: Inter Milan trio Alessandro Bastoni, Federico Dimarco, and Nicolo Barella will all reportedly start for Italy against Estonia. This according to today’s print edition of Milan-based newspaper Gazzetta dello Sport, via FCInterNews. Tomorrow, Italy will play their first match under Gennaro Gattuso as coach. The legendary former midfielder took over from Luciano Spalletti this summer.
